articles.title: Modern human brain originated 1.7 mn years ago in Africa - Sify News
articles.description: London, April 9 (IANS) Modern human brain structures developed 1.5 to 1.7 million years ago in the African Homo populations and after they had already begun walking on two feet and had even started spreading out of Africa, according to a study.

articles.title: Volkswagen Amarok V6 now available with bullet-resistant conversion - IOL

articles.title: Covid-19: African Union drops AstraZeneca from its vaccine plan - News24
